name: UnPress
description:
UnPress is a simple puzzel game made for the GMTK 2020 Jam, where you can only use each button a certain amount of times. The goal of each level is to reach the exit door with only you limited moves. 

I hope you will enjoy the game even though its short!

Tip: You can use both WASD and the Arrow Keys if you have trouble placing your fingers on your keyboard
